content:
I am an enthusiast in Deep Learning, Machine Learning and Reinforcement Learning with a proficient knowledge in the domain of industrial robots and robotic automation.
Currently, I am working as an Industrial Engineer and my role is to improve the production efficiency using novel machine learning and deep learning techniques. My master thesis involved, coordinating two UR5 robots (Universal Robots) using Reinforcement Learning with ROS as a robotic automation tool.
summary:
I am an enthusiast in Deep Learning, Machine Learning and Reinforcement Learning with a proficient knowledge in the domain of industrial robots and robotic automation.
Currently, I am working as an Industrial Engineer and my role is to improve the production efficiency using novel machine learning and deep learning techniques.
title: Murtaza Khuzema Basuwala

summary: A model is developed using UNet with the help of Convolution Neural Networks that takes a chest x-ray image as input and predicts whether the given image has a pneumothorax or not.
title: Identify Pneumothorax Disease using Image Classification (UNet)

summary: Two UR5 robots reach targets specified within their own workspace and coordinate at a common point using Reinforcement Learning
title: Coordinating Two UR5 Robots using Reinforcement Learning

summary: Designing an RL agent for the actuator of the PSM machine to reach the parcel position in the most optimum way.
title: Motion Control of a peristaltic sorting machine using reinforcement learning

summary: Here two UR5 robots are coordinated using planning pipelines from ROS Moveit to execute a pick-and-place type scenario.
title: Pick and Place using ROS/MoveIt

summary: A linear and non-linear controller were designed for a bioreactor system to control the flow of glucose into the substrate for producing biomass.
title: Designing a Non-Linear Controller for a Bioreactor System

summary: A UR5 robot arm is trained using Proximal Policy Optimization (PPO) to reach 5 random targets defined in the environment and is evaluated on three new targets.
title: Training a UR5 Robot on random targets using Reinforcement Learning

summary: Classical ML models such as logistic regression, random forest and gradient boosting are used to train on cat-in-the-dat dataset.
title: Classic Machine Learning Models
